      • evaluateObjective

        public double evaluateObjective()
        when x has been calculated, evaluate the objective. see eqn (29.42) of Cormen et al. 
         z = v + summation_j_in_nIndices(c_j*x_j)
        Specified by:
        evaluateObjective in class LinearProgramming.FormTuple
        Returns:

      • isFeasible

        public boolean isFeasible()

      • computeBasicSolution

        public double[] computeBasicSolution()
        using the present forms, sets all rhs x's to 0 to solve for the lhs x's. The x vector is returned.
        Specified by:
        computeBasicSolution in class LinearProgramming.FormTuple
